channel.title: Mental Barriers on Greg McMullen
channel.description: Recent content in Mental Barriers on Greg McMullen

item.title: Staying Motivated by Setting Goals
item.description: Everyone takes their eyes off the goal. Everyone. Who remembers Michael Phelps’ incident after the 2008 Olympics? What about Ryan Lochte, did you even know he was debating skipping the 2016 Olympics, but recently changed his mind? See, even gold medal athletes get distracted. Obstacles are what you see when you take your eyes off the goal. - Vince Lombardi Staying Motivated There are thousands of articles on how to stay motivated.
